Class Juggler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Juggler

  • public class Juggler
extends java.lang.Object
    Juggler class performs all the neccessary actions to deal with balls. The Juggler will catch and throw balls.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Juggler()
      Constructor creates hands and random numbers for numUnthrownBalls and totalBalls

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void catchBall()
      removes the ball from the air and puts the ball in the one hand
      int getNumUnthrownBalls() 
      void passBall()
      Will pass the ball from one hand to the other
      void throwBall()
      if there are unthrown balls, the juggler will throw a ball in the air.
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Juggler

        public Juggler()
        Constructor creates hands and random numbers for numUnthrownBalls and totalBalls

    • Method Detail

      • passBall

        public void passBall()
        Will pass the ball from one hand to the other

      • throwBall

        public void throwBall()
        if there are unthrown balls, the juggler will throw a ball in the air. The air will add the ball and the number of unthrown balls will decrease

      • catchBall

        public void catchBall()
        removes the ball from the air and puts the ball in the one hand

      • getNumUnthrownBalls

        public int getNumUnthrownBalls()
        Returns:
        the number of unthrown balls

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the man figure with the unthrown balls on the ground
